*Extend red colored objects towards right, without overlapping and Add borders to cyan colored objects with cyan border.*
completions.code:
(do 
      (rule 
        (vars (this)) 
        (filter 
           (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        ) 
(apply 
          (extend_node right false) 
      )) 
 (rule 
        (vars (this)) 
        (filter 
           (color_equals (color_of this) C) 
        ) 
(apply 
          (add_border C) 
      )) 
  )

completions.nl_description: All objects of color R are extended vertically in both directions, without overlapping.
Extend the objects of color R downward without overlap.
Extend all objects of color R to the right, with overlap.
Extend all objects colored R in all directions (not overlapping objects).
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
        )
    )
)

Extend all the objects of color R horizontally to the right until the edge of the grid.
Extend the objects of color R in the same direction, with overlapping.
Move objects of color R one step to the right and recolor them, and move objects of color G up and recolor them.
Extend all objects of color R vertically, leaving a trail.
Extend all objects of color R towards the bottom, without overlapping.
Extend all objects of color R downward without overlapping.
Extend the red object to the right until the grid's edge.
Extend all R-colored objects downward while allowing overlap.
Extend all the objects of size 1 in the direction specified while creating an overlapping effect until it touches the edge or another object. This direction is determined by the neighboring object.
Extend all objects of color R downwards, without overlapping.
Extend the objects of color R vertically without overlapping.
Duplicate all red objects, extending them diagonally until they span the grid.
Extend all objects of color R downward, without overlapping.
Extend the objects of color R and G, moving R downward and G upward, without overlapping.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) R))
        (apply (extend_node down false))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) G))
        (apply (extend_node up false))
    )
)
